Description:
We are seeking a passionate and dynamic Fashion Sales Consultant to join our team in Doha, Qatar. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in fashion retail sales and be able to provide exceptional customer service. As a Fashion Sales Consultant, you will be responsible for assisting customers in finding the perfect clothing and accessories to suit their style and preferences. You will also be responsible for maintaining the store's visual merchandising standards and ensuring a positive shopping experience for all customers.Responsibilities:Greet and assist customers in a friendly and professional manner
Provide personalized shopping recommendations based on customers' preferences and style
Assist customers with trying on and fitting clothing and accessories
Maintain knowledge of current fashion trends and product offerings
Process customer transactions accurately and efficiently
Ensure the store is clean, organized, and well-maintained
Participate in regular inventory counts and restock merchandise as needed
Build and maintain relationships with customers to foster repeat business
Stay up-to-date on sales targets and actively work towards achieving them
Adhere to company policies and procedures at all timesSkills
Skills:
1-5 years of experience in fashion retail sales
Passionate about fashion and staying up-to-date with the latest trends
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
Strong customer service orientation
Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment
Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills
Flexible and adaptable to changing priorities
Ability to work well independently as well as in a team
Proficient in using point-of-sale systems and other retail software
Fluency in English; knowledge of Arabic is a plus
Strong sales and negotiation skills
Excellent product knowledge
Ability to multitask and prioritize
Attention to detail
Ability to work under pressure
Knowledge of customer service principles
Ability to work flexible hours, including evenings and weekends
Ability to lift and carry heavy objects
Knowledge of fashion styling techniques
Understanding of customer buying behavior
